intro: Citharexylum schottii, commonly known as the silver flame tree, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It is a small to medium-sized evergreen shrub or tree that can grow up to 6 meters in height. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of fragrant, white or pale yellow flowers. It belongs to the family Verbenaceae and is known for its ornamental value in gardens. The flowers are typically borne in terminal panicles and bloom during the rainy season.
